about_the_game:
Salvation Hours - Supporter Pack is for all those who wish to support me and my future endeavors for developing games.

Supporter pack will include some extra stuff that was a part of the development journey, such as my dev notes, clips from older builds, old screenshots that were taken before migrating to UE5.3, Developer documentary, some wallpapers/artworks and lastly, soundtracks.

I hope you enjoy going through these memoirs of all the stuff that happened behind the scenes while developing Salvation Hours.

I'm thankful to all those who do decide to purchase this along with the game. Thanks for going an extra mile in helping me. I hope you enjoyed the game as well.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i3 10100 or AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or similar (4 Cores /8 Threads)
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or RX 5600 XT (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Storage mentioned here is only for the Supporter Pack DLC content which is an optional download after purchase.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or similar (6 Cores / 12 Threads)
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 or RX 6700 XT (8GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Supporter pack includes - Developer behind the scenes, artwork, wallpapers, developer documentary and soundtrack. This pack servers as a way to support Wolf Wire Studios.
